Class FriendDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • FriendDAO

  • public class FriendDAO
extends java.lang.Object
    The FriendDAO class stores information related to a Data Manager of Friend objects of the current farmer.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FriendDAO(Farmer currentFarmer)
      Constructs a FriendDAO object which initializes and manages a list of Friends and a list of Pending Friends of the current Farmer.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addNewPending(java.lang.String tempFarmer)
      Adds username of the Current Farmer to his friend PendingFriend List csv datafile when he makes a Friend Request to that person.
      void checkFileExist(java.lang.String friendFileName, java.lang.String pendingFileName)
      Checks whether FriendList csv datafile and PendingFriend List csv datafile exists.
      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getFriendList()
      Returns the String ArrayList of the Friend Names of the Current Farmer.
      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getFriendList(java.lang.String farmerName)
      Returns the String ArrayList of Friend Names of Farmer who is friend of the Current Farmer.
      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getPendingList()
      Returns the String ArrayList of the Pending Friend Names of the Current Farmer.
      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getPendingList(java.lang.String farmerName)
      Returns the String ArrayList of PendingFriend Names of Farmer who sent Friend Request to the Current Farmer.
      void loadFriends()
      Loads Friend csv datafile and Pending Friend csv datafile of the Current Farmer.
      void updateFriendList()
      Updates the Friend List of the Current Farmer to his Friend csv datafile.
      void updatePendingList()
      Updates the PendingFriend List of the Current Farmer to his PendingFriend csv datafile.
      void updateTempArraylistFarmer(java.lang.String tempFarmer, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> tempFriendList)
      Updates the String ArrayList of Friend Names of Farmer to his csv Friend datafile.
      void updateTempFriendList(java.lang.String tempFarmer)
      Adds username of the Current Farmer to his friend Friend csv datafile when his Friend Request is accepted.
      void updateTempPendingList(java.lang.String tempFarmer)
      Removes the username of the Current Farmer from the PendingFriend List of his Friend whose Friend Request got accepted.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • addNewPending

        public void addNewPending(java.lang.String tempFarmer)
        Adds username of the Current Farmer to his friend PendingFriend List csv datafile when he makes a Friend Request to that person.
        Parameters:
        tempFarmer - the username of the Friend who the Current Farmer is sending Friend Request to.

      • updateTempFriendList

        public void updateTempFriendList(java.lang.String tempFarmer)
        Adds username of the Current Farmer to his friend Friend csv datafile when his Friend Request is accepted.
        Parameters:
        tempFarmer - the username of the Friend that the Friend Request of the Current Farmer is accepted.

      • updateTempArraylistFarmer

        public void updateTempArraylistFarmer(java.lang.String tempFarmer,
                                      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> tempFriendList)
        Updates the String ArrayList of Friend Names of Farmer to his csv Friend datafile.
        Parameters:
        tempFarmer - the username of the Farmer whose datafile is going to be saved
        tempFriendList - String ArrayList of Friend Names.

      • updateTempPendingList

        public void updateTempPendingList(java.lang.String tempFarmer)
        Removes the username of the Current Farmer from the PendingFriend List of his Friend whose Friend Request got accepted.
        Parameters:
        tempFarmer - the name of the friend whose the Friend Request got Accepted.

      • getPendingList

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getPendingList(java.lang.String farmerName)
        Returns the String ArrayList of PendingFriend Names of Farmer who sent Friend Request to the Current Farmer.
        Parameters:
        farmerName - the username of Farmer who sent Friend Request to the Current Farmer.

      • getFriendList

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getFriendList(java.lang.String farmerName)
        Returns the String ArrayList of Friend Names of Farmer who is friend of the Current Farmer.
        Parameters:
        farmerName - the username of Farmer who sent Friend Request to the Current Farmer.
